text: Deewar ka qissa yeh hai kay iss shehar mein do yateem bachay hain jin ka khazana inn ki iss deewar kay neechay dafan hai inn ka baap bara nek shaks tha to teray rab ki chahat thi kay yeh dono yateem apni jawani ki umar mein aaker apna yeh khazana teray rab ki meharbani aur rehmat say nikal len mein ney apni raye say koi kaam nahi kiya yeh thi asal haqeeqat unn waqiyaat ki jin per aap say sabar na hosaka
